name: Divio AG
description:
Divio is offering systems and tools for django CMS that empower agencies, developers and organisations to build high-value and sustainable online presences. Launched in 2001, the company is today located in Zürich and has Offices in New York (USA), Kiev (UA) and Cardiff (UK).
Divio is a proudly committed contributor to open-source software; it releases its own projects such as django CMS under open licences and supports numerous other projects and initiatives with funding and resources.
It is also the company behind Aldryn, a cloud-based hosting and development platform that makes publishing with django CMS even easier and the tool of choice for many web agencies working with Django around the world.
More about Divio: www.divio.com
